name: Aloha Jumper Adventures - Moana Friend in Jungle
name_original: Aloha Jumper Adventures - Moana Friend in Jungle
description:
Make the Aloha Jumper jump over the rifts! Get as far as you can. Beware of wild birds, but try to crush down the parrot - it will give you extra life!

Easy to play! Touch and hold to raise a pole - release finger to jump!

This game is completely FREE!

Aloha Jumping Adventure Game will test your skills and reflexes!

Compete with your friends and players all around the world!
